definition: great talent/rare capability/person of outstanding ability

sentences.english: Qin lost deer, one by one of the world total, so Gaocai foot disease, first served behavior.
sentences.chinese: 秦失其鹿，天下共逐之，于是高材疾足者先得焉。

sentences.english: Besides being a top student, he is an outstanding athlete.
sentences.chinese: 他除了是个高材生外，还是一个出色的运动员。

sentences.english: The cream of this year's graduates will get high-paid jobs.
sentences.chinese: 本届毕业的高材生将获得高薪职位。

sentences.english: In fact, she is one of the top students in our class.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，她还是我们班的高材生。

sentences.english: That's no wonder for a straight A.
sentences.chinese: 对一个高材生来说这不奇怪。

sentences.english: A top student, Wing Sze is now pursuing an MPhil at Chinese University.
sentences.chinese: 这位高材生现正在中文大学攻读哲学硕士课程。

definition: excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
bachelor's degree/person holding a university degree
higher education record/record including Master's or Doctoral degree
conduct and learning (of an individual)/moral nature and skill
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
